alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 14 at 7:04PM CST until December 15 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 589 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 AM EST THURSDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA COFFEE DALE GENEVA HENRY HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 10 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN GADSDEN LIBERTY IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN GULF HOLMES JACKSON WALTON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA CLAY DECATUR EARLY MILLER QUITMAN SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ABBEVILLE MUNICIPAL A/P, ABE SPRINGS, ALPINE HEIGHTS, APALACHICOLA, ARGYLE, ASBURY, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAGBY STATE PARK, BAINBRIDGE, BARKER STORE, BATTENS CROSSROADS, BAY CITY, BEAMON, BELLVIEW, BENNETT, BEVERLY, BLACKWELL FIELD A/P, BLACKWOOD, BLAKELY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BONIFAY, BOYKIN, BROWNS CROSSROADS, BROWNTOWN, BUCK SIDING, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CARRABELLE, CENTER RIDGE, CENTERVILLE, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CLARKSVILLE, CLUSTER SPRINGS, COBB CROSSROADS, COLQUITT, COOKTOWN, COTTONWOOD, CROSSROADS, CRYSTAL LAKE, CUBA, DALEVILLE, DALKEITH, DAVIS PARK, DAYS CROSSROADS, DE FUNIAK SPRING AIRPORT, DE FUNIAK SPRINGS, DECATUR CO A/P, DILL, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DOTHAN, DOUGLASVILLE, DURHAM, EARLY CO A/P, ECONFINA, ENTERPRISE, ENTERPRISE, ENTERPRISE MUNICIPAL A/P, EUCHEEANNA, EWELL, FADETTE, FAIRCHILD, FIVE POINTS, FORT GADSDEN, FORT GAINES, FORT RUCKER, FRINK, GANER, GENEVA, GENEVA MUNICIPAL A/P, GEORGETOWN, GRACEVILLE, HACODA, HANOVER, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HARTFORD, HATCHER, HEADLAND, HEADLAND MUNICIPAL A/P, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, HONEYVILLE, HOWARD CREEK, JONES CROSSING, KEYTON, LAWRENCEVILLE, LEONIA, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOGAN FIELD MUNICIPAL A/P, LYNN, LYNN HAVEN, MABSON, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, MAYHAW, MOORES CROSSROADS, NEW HOPE, NIXON, OAK GROVE, ODENA, ORANGE HILL, OZARK, PANAMA CITY, PECAN, POPLAR HEAD, PORT ST. JOE, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RICKS PLACE, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SCOTTS FERRY, SCREAMER, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, STEINHAM STORE, SWEETWATER, TILTON, UNION, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WETUMPKA, WEWAHITCHKA, WHITE CITY, AND WIRE BRIDGE.
